response.original_title: James Bond's Spectre with Jonathan Ross
response.overview: In James Bond's Spectre - with Jonathan Ross, film buff and huge Bond fan Jonathan fronts this one-off hour-long special about one of the world's longest running and most successful film series, as the latest instalment is about to hit cinemas. And as well as securing a one-on-one chat with Daniel, aka Bond, on set, Jonathan will also speak to other leading cast members including Naomie Harris, Andrew Scott, Monica Bellucci, Christoph Waltz and Lea Seydoux. He'll also be finding out some hints about the plot of the new thriller, as well as the other elements that make up a Bond movie, including the classic cars, impressive gadgets, evil villains and beautiful Bond girls.
response.title: James Bond's Spectre with Jonathan Ross
